entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
